Covercraft: Hi there! Need any help? Send us a text, or give us a call at 1-800-274-7006
Mon - Fri 9AM - 9PM EST. https://covercraft.attn.tv/akJ8iTQmkFLR - Sarah
Don't want to pay that ridiculous shipping cost
Covercraft: We offer free ground shipping on domestic orders over $75 and all Boat Covers and Bimini Tops ship free with no minimum required.

Well it was 70 something dollars but you guys had a discount because it's Valentine's Day so now I'm stuck with the shipping which is almost as much as the item itself why can't I get a break on the shipping

Covercraft: I understand! Since your order is just below the $75 free shipping threshold, one option is to add a small item to reach the minimum. For example, a floor mat or sunshade could help you get free shipping while also adding value to your order. You can shop our special offers here: https://covercraft.attn.tv/aMmuCj3FrT6-
I already ordered that from you
I was looking for anything else but you don't have any only big items
Covercraft: I understand. I'll make sure to send that as feedback to the team as well for consideration. Should you need any further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out.

SHEEX: Hi, if you need additional help please reach us at customerservice@sheex.com or call (856) 334-3021. Text STOP to opt out.

I am a Past Customer, several Orders in the past! Each of which we're between $200-$300. However in my Last order in December, I Paid $20.00 Extra to receive my order *GUARANTEEED BEFORE Christmas*, which I finally received in January! I have sent several texts to Your Customer Service. I  received a text telling me that it would be given attention and taken care.  Sadly I still have NOT received the $20,00 refund. I'm 83 years old and am So Disappointed that this has Still NOT been credited back to my Account as I was AssuredSincerelyStella Dooley 513-218-2251

SHEEX: Sorry for the slow reply and the inconvenience this has caused! Unfortunately, I haven't received any texts from you on this thread for the past month. However, let me raise this with the team. By the way, while we can't guarantee delivery dates, I can provide an estimate. Orders placed after 11 am EST will ship the next business day. Once shipped, your chosen shipping method takes effect. Could you please provide your order number and email address?

I sent My Order# with my Correspondence to You the first week in January. I thought my Patience with Your company would be Appreciated and I would Not have to send Repeated Reminders. Stella.dooley@yahoo.comPH.# 513-218-2251

SHEEX: I get where you're coming from because I'm a consumer, too and I'm sorry this didn't go as expected. I'll now have the team look into this. As soon as I hear back, I will send you a message right away!
Thank You So Very Much for Your Responce.
SHEEX: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
No, just a $20.00 CREDIT Back to My Credit Card. Thank You

SHEEX: Thanks for your patience! I just heard from the team, and we understand how important this is. We apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. Upon checking, we can see that we emailed you back in Jan. You were also refunded back in Jan.

If you have any further questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me. We're here to help!
I have NEVER RECEIVED A RECEIVED A REFUND! How abd when was that mailed to me? Because I NEVER RECEIVED IT.
SHEEX: I understand your concern. I see the refund was processed on the 16th for $21.30. I recommend checking with your bank.
Thank You So Very Much. I will check with my Bank in the Morning.
I cannot find an EMAIL. But I rarely use EMail, and it must have gone to a spam!
Which BANK did it go to, because I used a Credit Card to Pay for it.
Why would You send it to a Bank instead of Crediting it to my Credit Card that was used to Pay for the Sheets?

SHEEX: I'm really sorry to hear that, it's not the experience we wanted you to have. Unfortunately, due to the limited access I have on the system, I might not have information as to which bank it might have went to. Let me check on this with my team again. I hope for your continued patience with us.
